reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress fits perfectly, with one noting it comes to mid-thigh length, and appreciate its attention-grabbing style that doesn't look cheap.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars wow!!! GREAT LBD! UPDATE!! must read!
items.body: update *** so i STILL love this dress, even bought a second right after getting the first,...BUT i washed it&layed flat to dry&it shrank alil. just the length mostly. &the length was PERFECT before washing, (mini skirt length) if any shorter, i couldn't wear in public... for which is it now. so going to buy more&go up to a medium so i can wear outside my home. so if your 5'4 or taller, DO NOT BUY A SMALL.*** wasn't sure what to expect but i love this dress!! perfect amount of stretch, thick but not too thick(lined), soft fabric, could do back flips in it if i wanted to. was concerned about the sizing because the measurements were.. strange. but it's what i consider normal sizing. if you normally wear small, get small, etc. im 5'4 & 120-130lbs(?unsure) &bought a small. i can wear it with or without a bra. looks good eitherway. worth the price. only wish it was a little less so i can buy alot more of them. i want 3 in a bunch of colors. to hav for a long time. you can sleep in it ( it comes up..ALIL,but then stays put) dance in it, throw a sweater over it etc. can dress up or dress dwn. the good fabric leaves alot of options. its NOT see thru but the fabric is so soft it does hav a VERY slight sheer to it so if you buy a tight size, you'll see belly button, nips if no bra, etc. its tailored slightly, for the hips&butt,if you have one.. which i don't really, but not heavily tailored. that's why the fit is so good. when you bend over comes up a little. but if you buy the right size, it comes up JUST enough to be sexy, but not too much, to look inappropriate. highly recommend Read more
items.author: jenn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the buy
items.body: I had previously bought a black dress from Amazon a few years back and it had honestly disappointed me so I wasn't sure if I wanted to get this one but I'm so glad that I did because it's exactly like a pictures and the material is actually pretty thick but soft that emojed your body and it's quality while being simple and sexy it's not super short and what I really like is that I was unsure about the sizing cuz I'm losing weight and gaining but the small fit me just fine I will definitely be getting more of this dress in the future What I really like is that while its a strapless look, in the front it kind of cuts in a way that it's flattering for my body type instead of having that harsh line across Worth the buy Read more
items.author: Sara Negron

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little black dress
items.body: Not cheaply made! Solid fabric with good elasticity and had held up after plenty of trips through the wash. Very comfortable (as reported by the recipient) soft, form fitting. Length is good. Was purchased for a photo shoot. Read more
items.author: William J

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: Very cute and pretty!! Compliments body figure. Is a little longer than I thought it would be but you can scrunch it up. Read more
items.author: Kailey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shocked by the great quality for the price
items.body: I am 5’9, 130lbs and usually wear a size 2. The small fit me perfectly! I’m hesitant to buy dresses online because of my height, but the length was the perfect. I wanted it to be short enough to be sexy, yet not too short to be able to wear or constantly worrying about it riding up. Immediately upon opening it I was impressed by the quality of the material. It was thick, soft (without looking cheap), and not even remotely see-through. The squared neckline gave it an elevated look, the straps were comfortable and had the perfect amount of stretch, and I was able to dance throughout the night without it riding up. Further, it was tight enough to compliment my shape, without being too tight to be uncomfortable. It hugs you in all the right places while being surprisingly stretchy. You really can’t ask for a better looking little black dress for the price. I would definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Sydney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect purple color and fit
items.body: This dress was perfect for my joker costume. Would definitely buy again. Pretty color and so soft. The material has a great stretch to it. Read more
items.author: Stephen Thornton

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Short & tight
items.body: This is a sexy little black dress!! But I would say it is sized small and fits very tight (and short!) It is a clubbing / nightlife outfit rather than something more sophisticated or for lots of people to see... MINIMAL coverage! Read more
items.author: Michele

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, 10/10 dress
items.body: This dress was so much better than I expected. It’s really thick so you don’t have to worry about anything showing through, super comfortable and hugs the body very nicely. I used it for a halloween costume and I’m probably going to buy more in different colors! Read more
items.author: Sam

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Sky Blue, Brown, Pink, White, Purple, Dark Blue, Black, Light Pink, Dark Gray, Bright Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
